lead_paragraph: Tim Herron birdied three of his last four holes to take a one-stroke lead over Tim Clark at the U.S. Bank Championship yesterday in Milwaukee. Herron shot a 65 and was at 12-under-par 198 for the tournament. Clark carded a 66 and was tied for second with Joe Ogilvie, the leader after the second round, who shot a 69. Kenny Perry (67) was at nine-under. Jeff Brehaut (65) and Charlie Wi (66) were four strokes behind.
